title: Zion Williamson, NBA injuries, Raiders, NFL rules, and Conor McGregor
itunes:title: Zion Williamson, NBA injuries, Raiders, NFL rules, and Conor McGregor
description:
Colin talks about why Duke F Zion Williamson would already be a top 20 player in the NBA, the gruesome reality of NBA injuries, the personalty of Oakland Raiders HC Jon Gruden, the retirement of UFC fighter Conor McGregor, and why certain NFL rules don't need to be changed. Guests include Chris Broussard and Reggie Bush.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
